body:
Hey everyone, so here's a little forum game. 

How to play?

Let's say I have ziplined before, and the previous person that commented on this thread thought that I ziplined before. So here's how you should reply: [Yes(or no, if you didn't experience it before), I think the next person....] and so on.

I'll start:
I think the next person has been stuck on a rollercoaster before.
body_tagged:
Hey everyone, so here's a little forum game. 

How to play?

Let's say I have ziplined before, and the previous person that commented on this thread thought that I ziplined before. So here's how you should reply: [Yes(or no, if you didn't experience it before), I think the next person....] and so on.

I'll start:
I think the next person has been stuck on a rollercoaster before.
title: Prediction Game
